componentAttributes.richTextValue:
1. SE: Please replace this component with the Self-Service Scheduling Component and set the values to look like this:
  2. Operating Hours = Gold Appointments Calendar
  3. Scheduling Policy = Customer First
  4. Show Appointment Slots As = Arrival Windows
  5. Show customer’s name = checked
  6. Show customer’s address = checked
  7. Scheduling Horizon Units = Days
  8. Number of Scheduling Horizon Units = 7
  9. Allow customers to add notes = checked
  10. Allow customers to confirm the appointment = checked
  11. Status After Confirmation = Dispatched
  12. Statuses That Allow Rescheduling = Scheduled, Dispatched
  13. Hours Before Appointment to Disable Rescheduling = 0
  14. Status After Rescheduling = Scheduled
  15. Let customers cancel appointments = checked
  16. Statuses That Allow Canceling = Scheduled, Dispatched
  17. Status After Canceling = Canceled

Your safety is our #1 Priority


We will send you a photo of your technician on the day of the service visit.


Covid Statement


We are actively monitoring the coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and have measures in place to ensure we continue to serve our customers in a way that is safe for both customers and our employees. We are committed to serving the needs of our customers while also having the privilege and responsibility of providing an essential service that our communities rely on.


To help minimize impact to service, we will continue to refer to guidelines and protocol provided by the CDC and local health officials in the areas we serve.
Need a little extra help scheduling your service appointment? That's ok. Feel free to text with us or call us with the ? bubble in the lower part of your screen.
